item.title: 317 DELTA - [::teleport1on] always a rep++!
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

I know offering a rep++ for help is against the rules but it shouldn’t matter because i’d rep++ the for the help anyways so don’t lock this!

EDIT:
I’m my server I have a drop party room as the Camelot teleport.

When they click the camelot teleport a custom interface opens with more teleports on it.
There is one that says drop party.

That would make the button in clickingmost.java:

case 70100: if (c.dropparty == 1) { c.closeAll(); c.triggerTele(2736, 3476, 0); } else if (c.dropparty <= 1) { c.sM("You can't use this teleport unless there is a drop party!"); } break;

I would like to make the teleport to there (Camelot teleport)(now a custom interface) toggle on, and off.

I already added:

public int dropparty = 0;

That would make the commands to toggle on:

if (command.startsWith("droppartyon")) { dropparty == 1; triggerTele(Xpos, Ypos, 0); }

That would make the commands to toggle off:

if (command.startsWith("droppartyon") && playerRights >=3) { dropparty == 0; }

What I don’t know is how to make the

dropparty == 0;
effect all player logged in.

If someone could help me out that’d be great!

Read full topic
